detail: You see two printers on the North wall, and mailboxes on the South wall.
There are two microwaves, a fridge, a sink, a public table, and a whiteboard with the joke of the day.

On the West wall of the hallway, there are the offices of Arup Roy and Rongching Dai, and mandatory employment-related legal posters. On the East wall, there are two bathroom doors, a door to a maintenance room, and a first aid kit.
